metadata.synopsis: This AD oneliner is triggered when a player character is doubling back after having started the helm combat. The alternative gith guide (he exists when Laezel is an avatar) will warn players against going back and urge them to press on to the transponder.This line will be acompanied by some explosions and fire to represent the nautiloid going down and the urgency to reach the transponder to escape. If players continue to go back they will die.
